title: Software Developer (m/f) - ISG Personalmanagement
subtitle: Central Lower Austria-West, Nö
body:
Our customer, a globally active, Austrian company with its headquarter in Central Region Lower Austria-West , which stands for forward-looking ideas, constant progress and the highest level of expertise. The company has specialized in the development and production of complex lighting systems for the automotive industry using state-of-the-art production technologies. At a total of eight locations in Europe, America and Asia, it is one of the leading providers in its segment with their efficient complete systems.

To strengthen the innovative, dynamic team the following position has to be filled.

SOFTWARE DEVELOPER (m/f)

Light Simulation / Raytracing

In this position, you are responsible for the development of the software, which is used in all locations for light simulation and optical geometry calculation. You are characterized by a high degree of teamwork and communication skills.

Your responsibilities:
  • Development of new inhouse software products
  • Optimization and further development of the existing photometric inhouse simulation software
  • Implementation of complex physical algorithms in the field of Monte Carlo Raytracing, Geometric Optics, Wave Optics and GPGPU
  • Development of the software in the team
Your profile:
  • Completed education in physics or similar (FH, University)
  • Professional experience as a developer is desirable
  • Programming knowledge in C ++, QT, Python, Java, HTML, JavaScript, CSS (Windows / Linux) is an advantage
  • Independent work and a high technical and analytical mind

An attractive monthly gross salary of € 3.000,-- is planned for this position. The actual amount of your income will be individually agreed depending on your qualifications such as education, work experience and personal strengths.
If you are interested in this challenging position, we look forward to receiving your meaningful application with reference to 75.859 preferred via our ISG Career Portal or by email.
